hi and welcome you listening to the X
when I to report my name is Dave and
this is episode 1184 and today's date is
January 22nd 2017 and the thought of the
episode is the current economic collapse
news brief let's get right into the
economic collapse news now the central
bankers they are nervous about what is
going to happen remember their whole
agenda is globalization their whole
agenda is to place countries into debt
their whole agenda is to spread debt and
the only way they can do this is by
getting people to take on more debt and
this is why they lowered the auto loan
to the subprime this is why mortgages
they let in the subprime people and we
know former President Barack Obama he
was going to lower the fees in regards
to the FHA mortgages and Trump came in
and what he did was he shut it all down
within an hour of being sworn in Trump
undid one of Obama's last minute actions
a mortgage fee cut under a government
program catering to first-time home
buyers and low-income bars the cut which
would become effective on January 27th
would have reduced to the annual premium
for someone borrowing $200,000 by $500
in the first year however this would
expose taxpayers to further losses if
there was a spike in defaults and we
know that this is coming we know that
the housing market well it hasn't
recovered like they're telling us the
housing market right now has been built
up on phony data it has built up on free
money and it is one gigantic bubble now
very interestingly we can see that the
central bankers they are preparing to
blame everything on Trump now again I
don't care who the president is
the president is really not calling the
shots it's really the central bank the
shadow government behind the scenes
now they're going to try to control
Trump right now and we'll have to see
how Trump reacts does he play ball with
them or does he go against them now just
for our information so when the economy
starts to fall apart because we know
it's going to happen we know they're
gonna be blaming it on Trump we can see
that world trade actually has increased
by less than 1% annually in the last
decade so what we're seeing right now is
that world trade well it hasn't really
gone anywhere
now according to the C P B world trade
monitor the value of world exports has
increased by 1% less than 1% annually
making a high on July 31st 2007 compared
to more than a 5 percent annualized
growth rate since 1991 even with
extraordinary global monetary easing in
the post-financial crisis world world
trade has been unable to find the extra
gear it hit during the pre-crisis error
so the next time the mainstream media
The Economist's everyone else starts to
blame Trump for collapsing world trade
everyone needs to look back in time to
say well wait a minute it was already
less than 1% we didn't hit 5% we didn't
hit anything actually it's a complete
disaster and we know this is what
they're going this is what they're going
to do now very interestingly we know
that the UK we know that Italy France
they all want to leave the EU and we
know the central bankers are going to
give these countries a very tough time
even if the people vote for it we know
they're coming up with a way to try to
stop this now we know the UK it looks
like they're gonna try to implement
article 50 come this March and we're
already getting word from Mario Draghi
and they have a plan to how to stop this
entire thing what are they going to do
four countries to leave the EU they must
first settle their debts with the bloc's
target to payment system before severing
ties he said if a country were to leave
the euro system its natural its national
central banks claims on or liabilities
to the ECB would need to be settled in
full he did not specify in what currency
the settlement would have to take place
it was also not clear just what the ECB
would do in response if a country did
not settle its claims and remember the
ECB wanted a police force their own army
I mean was this the reason that they
wanted this but we can see already
they're telling the countries like you
can't leave this you need to pay your
debt and most of these countries they
can't do it now the IMF is out there and
they're warning that there's going to be
disruptions in the global economy in
2017 now remember we went back in time
and we saw what the world global trade
was like and it hasn't really gone over
one percent it's a disaster it never
returned to the pre-crisis percentage
and now the IMF is out there telling
everyone that things don't look good for
what is coming and this is some of their
concerns some of the concerns of
spillover is produced by the policies of
Donald Trump administration in the US
and the brexit in the UK might
eventually come true producing a net
negative outcome for the world economy
overall and the reshaping of the global
economic landscape might turn out to be
very painful so they're already setting
this up because they know what's going
to happen they're going to bring down
the economy at a certain point in time
and they're gonna shift the blame now
Donald Trump on the other hand he's
gonna be trying to shift the blame to
the central bank we have a war going on
right now
between two systems
the private West a central bank system
and those who are trying to get rid of
the Central Bank and the central bankers
well they don't like this Trump has also
signed an executive order to ease the
burden of Obamacare as we transition
from Obamacare to a new health insurance
and right now they haven't announced
what the new health insurance is going
to be now what's very interesting is
that the spokesperson for Donald Trump
Sean Spicer came out and he chastised
the US media outlets accusing reporters
of under stating the numbers of
supporters present during the
inauguration and people are all over the
show some media saying oh my god what
babies I can't believe it and there's
pictures all over the social media
comparing 2009 Obama inauguration and
2017 Trump inauguration and you can see
and when you look at him you're like oh
my God look at these pictures we see a
huge crowd with Obama and nobody showing
up for Trump now when we look at these
pictures we have to understand when were
they taking were they taking at the same
exact time when both were given the
speech no the picture that they're
showing is when people were arriving for
Trump's inauguration now the Atlantic
they have a timeline of different
pictures and they show this and there's
a caption underneath that says people
are gathering for the inauguration now
this is the picture they're using and
this is what Donald Trump's
administration is talking about this is
not apples to apples they're not
comparing the same thing because when
you look at a different picture of one
Trump is actually giving his speech well
the crowd looks very different now we
could take this a step further and
what's very interesting about this is
they didn't show any other aerial view
except for this one I mean all
throughout the inauguration you think
maybe snapping aerial shots but if you
notice they're very difficult to find
but CNN has a giggle pixel camera that
they used and you can zoom in on the
crowd and you can see this as we zoom in
and you go far back all the way very
close to where the Washington Monument
you can see the crowd is all there and
then when you look to the left you can
see the crowd and when you look to the
right you can see the crowd and you can
go to CNN I'll put the URL on the x-22
report comm site if you're on YouTube
you can see the camera and I'm zooming
in on each of the area so you can see
what the crowd actually looks like and
this is what they're talking about
they're saying you're not being honest
in what you're reporting now the numbers
are completely different because people
are not looking at the numbers they're
looking at the pictures and yes the
numbers aren't important and they're
saying each one of these sections well
they held about 200,000 or so people but
what people see and it's all over
Facebook it's all over the news New York
Times is carrying a C and then all of
them are or have this picture but it's
not an honest picture now the other
thing they were talking about is that
Trump wanted to use Frank Sinatra's song
during his inauguration and they said
that Nancy Sinatra and this is coming
from CNN well she was very unhappy about
this she didn't want Trump using it well
Nancy Sinatra came out and she said that
is not true I never said that
why do you lie CNN so already we see
that they're not really being honest in
what they're saying now to take this a
step further we see there was a YMCA in
Indiana they stopped airing CNN on its
television because the people inside of
the Y said that guess what this is fake
they're lying
we can't have this on
the TVs while we work out so the people
actually said you know something we
don't want to see CNN anymore please
change the channel now a day after Trump
was inaugurated we had the woman in the
world March and they were supposed to be
a million women in Washington I think
the corporate media said it was about
five hundred thousand which normally
means it was probably a little bit less
but there was marches all around the
world and this was about women's rights
but when you looked at it I'm not too
sure it was just women's rights it
looked more like we're gonna bash Trump
we don't like who our president is and
let's go out there and bash Trump now I
have nothing against women's rights
everyone should have the right everyone
has the right to protest everyone has
the right to do all these things this is
America we're born with these rights and
yes you can do this but there's a former
Wall Street Journal reporter Astra
Nnamani asks in the New York Times what
is the link between of one of Hillary
Clinton's largest donors and the woman's
March and her answer as it turns out
it's quite significant this is what she
discovered billionaire George Soros has
ties to more than 50 partners of the
woman's march on Washington and the
Guardian was touted that the woman's
march on Washington was completely
spontaneous an action for women's rights
well she found out that this was not a
grassroots effort she found out that
this was backed by Soros he funded 56 of
these groups and ASRA said you know
someone who voted for Trump she didn't
feel welcomed in the March she didn't
feel that it was really for women's
rights she felt like it was more for
bashing Trump and I hear a lot of women
where I am talking about it saying yes
we believe in women rights but when we
look at this it looks like it was more
about bashing Trump than anything else
now she decided to follow the money she
poured through documents of the
billionaire George Soros and she was
wondering what are the links between one
of hillary clinton's largest donors and
the woman's March and she found out
plenty Soros has funded or has a close
relation with at least 56 of the Marches
partners including key partners like
Planned Parenthood which opposes Trump
national resource Defense Council which
opposes Trump and he has ties with the
women's March organization with also the
group moveon.org the National Action
Network which which was which has a
former executive director lauded by
Obama senior advisor Valerie Jarrett as
a leader of tomorrow and she went on and
on the American Civil Liberties Union
Center for Constitutional Rights Amnesty
International and Human Human Rights
Watch well Soros has connections to all
of these and she's saying that well this
was this really a grassroots uprising
and she's found out that it really
wasn't it was funded by Soros and it was
pushed around the world and again
everyone has the right to protest
everyone has a right to voice their
concerns that is not the problem the
problem is when it's pushed from a
certain individual convincing others
that it's for something when it's really
for something completely different
and what we're seeing right now is that
the corporate media George Soros they're
still pushing their agenda they're still
pushing it and you know it's funny where
were all these individuals before I mean
they were asking for equal pay with men
which everyone should have the same pay
if you do the job and you do it well you
should get paid the same where were they
a year ago why wasn't the March done
then where were they two years ago all
I'm saying is that the timing is very
interesting a day after a president that
was inaugurated all of a sudden
there was a March and most of the signs
were anti-trump most of the signs were
not really in what they were saying and
what they were doing and the timing is
very suspicious now another thing that
Trump has done which I find very
suspicious is that after his
inauguration a White House website laid
out a series of new policy positions
including a promise to develop a
state-of-the-art missile defense system
to protect against both Iran and North
Korea and what's very interesting about
this is that he's looking to develop a
completely new missile system to point
towards North Korea and replace the old
one that's pointing to Iran which is
actually pointing to Russia with a new
one and we know that he wanted to cut
expenses he wanted to cut the budgets
but what we're seeing right now is that
this is a pricy missile defense system
so it doesn't jive and what he's saying
and this should make everyone nervous
again why is he placing these things out
there who's behind all of this and what
are they trying to do because we can see
that there have been troops tanks moved
all around the world in Europe out in
the Pacific the Middle East and we know
that these individuals the central bank
the neocons they want to push war with
Russia they haven't given up on this and
they're going to continually try to do
this I mean we already see in the korver
media which will report on a couple days
ago how they were talking about how war
is going to play out and most likely
it's going to start out in Latvia and
they were trying to come up with this
whole scenario how how Putin actually is
going to start World War 3 because he
already invaded Ukraine and now he's
going to do this also in the Baltics so
they're really pushing this and they're
pushing it hard and we know this is
completely untrue once again now we see
chief advisor of the turkish President
Erdogan well they're out
and they're still calling for buffer
zones for refugees in Syria and they
want these buffer zones set up and what
they're saying is that the coalition
forces would protect the people fleeing
the war in these areas and they'll
control the area so they're still
pushing for this we see that the US and
Turkey well they're setting up new
military bases in Aleppo and hosaka in
northern Syria and what we're seeing
right now is that they're setting these
up and they're continually doing this
now once again this is a sovereign
country turkey should be not you should
not be setting up military bases the
United States should not be setting up
military bases and what they're saying
they're setting these up so it makes it
easier for the u.s. to bring in air

completely unbelievable because syria
has not invited the United States or
turkey for that matter into Syria and
they didn't give them permission to
create bases and allow cargo planes to
land in the area so they're doing
something completely different now we
can see that the u.s. well they're not
going to be sending a special delegation
to the Syrian talks right now and the
reason given from the State Department
is that because there is a transition

was just held and it looks like at this
point they don't have the ability to

going to do instead is they're gonna let
the u.s. be represented by its
ambassador to Kazakhstan so we see right
now
they're prepping for the Ambassador to
join in with these talks and we'll have
to see what happens but we need to
remember something very very important
nothing is done we're not out of the
woods at all actually things are

the shadow government well they're
butting heads with what Trump is trying
to do now Trump we don't know what side
he's on yet yeah
he's in the white house we don't know

actually it has declined
we went from 5% to under 1% and it's

they've gotten a lot worse and the only

they cyberattack DNC which we know it's
